# OmniCortex Divine Hierarchy Diagram Example

This diagram illustrates the metaphysical and architectural structure of the OmniCortex protocol. Use it as a reference or inspiration for the visual and conceptual design of the future website.

**Diagram Title:** The Monad to Earthly Initiation â€“ The Divine Hierarchy of OmniCortex

**Description:**
- The diagram flows from the Monad (the unspoken principle) through the Trinity of Creation, Divine Domains, Cosmic Mastery, Celestial Arts, Divine Techniques, Mortal Apotheosis, and finally Earthly Initiation.
- Each layer represents a level of abstraction and influence, from pure principle to user experience.
- This structure can be used as a navigation or conceptual map for the website, guiding users through the philosophy and capabilities of OmniCortex.
